FragilityCurve.Description: Costing based upon 1000 ft segments of pipe, horizontal main and branches
FragilityCurve.Name: Fire Sprinkler Water Piping - Horizontal Mains and Branches - Old Style Victaulic - Thin Wall Steel - with designed bracing, SDC D, E, or F (OSHPD or sim), PIPING FRAGILITY
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: One failure is expected per 1000 feet of pipe. This piping fragility does not have a corresponding bracing fragility. DamageState.Description: Spraying & Dripping Leakage at joints - 0.02 leaks per 20 ft section of pipe

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace leaking joints and minor water cleanup.

DamageState.Description: Joints Break - Major Leakage - 0.02 breaks per 20 ft section of pipe
